articles.author: Joshua Nelson
articles.title: Bongino says Soleimani 'having a pulse' was an imminent threat, blasts 'shameful' media coverage on Iran
articles.description: Former Secret Service agent Dan Bongino on Monday blasted the "shameful" media for having skewed coverage of the killing of top Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani.
articles.content: Former Secret Service agent Dan Bongino blasted the "shameful" media for having skewed coverage of the killing of top Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani, maintaining that there was an imminent threat posed by Soleimani, which prompted President Trump to order the … [+2193 chars]

articles.author: Chris Ciaccia
articles.title: Viking's left Greenland because they over-hunted walruses, research claims
articles.description: The mystery of why the Vikings abandoned their settlements in western Greenland has puzzled historians for hundreds of years. New research is shedding light on why they left the world’s largest island during the 15th century.
articles.content:
The mystery of why the Vikings abandoned their settlements in western Greenland has puzzled historians for hundreds of years. New research is shedding light on why they left the world’s largest island during the 15th century.

articles.author: Michael Goodwin
articles.title: Michael Goodwin: Trump's 'peace through strength' philosophy on Iran is what America needs
articles.description: After Trump’s decision to target Qassem Soleimani, the media’s favorite go-to critics featured members of Obama’s administration who crafted and sold the failed nuclear deal with Iran.
articles.content:

articles.author: William Sanchez
articles.title: Nazee Moinian Weighs In on Iranian Reaction To Soleimani Killing
articles.description: This week, Martha is joined by Iranian-American, Nazee Moinian, consultant on Iranian foreign policy, to discuss the reaction of the Iranian people to the killing of Soleimani and more.
